problems.title: Find Second Largest of Three Numbers
problems.description:
Given three distinct numbers, find and print the second largest among them using conditional statements.

Input Format:
Three integers separated by space.

Output Format:
Print the second largest number.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
10 25 15

Sample Output
15

Sample Input
5 2 8

Sample Output
5

Explanation:
Compare all three numbers to find the middle value (second largest).
hintsList: Compare all three numbers. The second largest is the one that is neither maximum nor minimum.
